name: SWNinePatchImageFactory
summary: Let you use 9-Patch PNG images easily on iOS.
description: The techinque is only to transform the 9-patch PNG images to iOS compatible, resizable UIImage objects. See the UIImage's method resizableImageWithCapInsets:(UIEdgeInsets)insets for more info. So it only support to stretch one segment of patch markers in both horizontal and vertical sides.
